mapper.insert: insert into workinghour (whdate, whgotime, whleavetime, userid) values (#{whdate},#{whgotime},#{whleavetime}, #{userid})
mapper.select: select * from workinghour where whdate=#{whdate} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into workflow (wfapplystartdate, wfapplyenddate, wfapplystarttime, wfapplyendtime, userid, wfcsrn) values(#{wfapplystartdate}, #{wfapplyenddate}, #{wfapplystarttime}, #{wfapplyendtime}, #{userid}, #{wfcsrn});

insert into originworkinghour (wfsrn, origingotime, originleavetime) values ((select wfsrn from workflow where wfsrn=#{wfsrn} and userid=#{userid} and wfcsrn=4 order by wfdate desc limit 1), (select whgotime from workinghour wh where whdate=(select wfapplystartdate from workflow where wfsrn=#{wfsrn} and userid=#{userid} and wfcsrn=4 order by wfdate desc limit 1) order by whsrn desc limit 1), (select whleavetime from workinghour wh where whdate=(select wfapplystartdate from workflow where wfsrn=#{wfsrn} and userid=#{userid} and wfcsrn=4 order by wfdate desc limit 1) order by whsrn desc limit 1));
mapper.select: select positiondayoff from position p where positionno=(select category_positionno from user where userid=#{userid})
select sum(duse) from dayoff where wfsrn in (select wfsrn from workflow where userid=#{userid} and wfcsrn != 4 and wfstatus='승인')
select username, userid from user u where u.userid in (select uid from invitemember where cno=1 and pgsrn = (select groupno from sgroup where summer_user_userid=#{summer_user_userid}));

select duse from dayoff where wfsrn in (select wfsrn from workflow where wfcsrn != 4 and userid in (select uid from invitemember where pgsrn=(select groupno from sgroup where summer_user_userid=#{summer_user_userid}) and cno=1) and wfapplystartdate >= #{wfapplystartdate} and wfapplyenddate <= #{wfapplyenddate});

select wfcsrn, wfapplystartdate, wfapplyenddate, substr(wfapplystartdate,6, 2)`wfapplystartmonth`, substr(wfapplyenddate, 6,2)`wfapplyendmonth`, substr(wfapplystartdate, 9,2)`wfapplystartday`, substr(wfapplyenddate, 9,2)`wfapplyendday` from workflow where userid=#{userid} and wfcsrn != 4 and wfstatus='승인' order by wfapplystartdate;
select datediff(wfapplyenddate,wfapplystartdate) from workflow where userid=#{userid} and wfcsrn != 4 and wfstatus='승인'
select datediff(wfapplyenddate,wfapplystartdate) from workflow where userid=#{userid} and wfcsrn != 4 and wfstatus='승인'and wfsrn=${wfsrn}

mapper.delete: delete from workflow where userid=#{userid} and wfsrn=#{wfsrn} and wfstatus='진행중'
mapper.select: select * from workflow where userid in (select uid from invitemember where pgsrn=(select groupno from sgroup where summer_user_userid=#{summer_user_userid}) and cno=1) order by wfsrn desc;

select u.userid, username, whdate, whgotime, whleavetime from user u left outer join (select distinct userid, whdate, whgotime, whleavetime from workinghour where whdate='2023-07-06' and userid in (select uid from invitemember where pgsrn=(select groupno from sgroup where summer_user_userid='gaceo') and cno=1))wh on u.userid = wh.userid;
